entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
